short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your Jira achievements to Promoti in a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start to use your work's impact to achieve more! With Promoti Chrome Extension, you can easily collect your achievement and things you have done or care about. Then, You only need to organize your thoughts using the cards you've collected and prepared for your next promotion!

It's really easy to start and start boosting your career by adding your first achievement!

How Promoti works? 
Three steps to prepare for your annual review -  Collect. Generate. Be ready.
   1. Collect your achievements from Jira, Asana, Trello or Monday.com
   2. Write the impact it had on the company.
   3. Organize and generate your annual report (future).

Please note: This is a Beta version and might and sometimes most probably will contain bugs ;)

Features:
 • Save Jira Tickets into your achievement library.
 • Take notes on saved Tickets (such as KPI, Goal, and impact)
 • Add Jira labels to your collected tickets.

Hope you'll enjoy it!
